EmailTemplate.name: Global_Product_Email_Pivotal HD Launch.Community Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Downloading Pivotal HD Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Review Your Documentation Review Your Documentation Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank You for downloading Pivotal HD Community. Please don't forget to review the important documentation for installation, administration, as well as the advanced tutorials. You can access the information here: Installation and Administrator User Guides
- Pivotal HD Community README.txt <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-sw/Pivotal-HD-1.0.1-Community-Release.txt> - Pivotal Command Center 2.0.1 Release Notes <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PCC_201_README.pdf> - Pivotal Command Center 2.0 Installation and User Guide <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PCC_20_Guide.pdf> - Pivotal HD Enterprise 1.0.1 Release Notes <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PHD_101_README.pdf> - Pivotal HD Enterprise 1.0 Installation and Administrator Guide <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PHD_10_Guide.pdf> - Pivotal HD Enterprise 1.0 Stack and Tool Reference Guide <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PHD_10_Stack.pdf> - Pivotal DataLoader 2.0 Installation and User Guide <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotal-docs/PDataLoader_20_Guide.pdf>
For more advanced tutorials please click here <http://pivotalhd.cfapps.io/> Have questions? Contact us <mailto:marketing@gopivotal.com>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team Stay current on all things Pivotal Visit our blog >> <blog.gopivotal.com> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
